abstract.p: List of some recent residential sale prices in New York City and Conn; photo (S)

block.p: $649,000 290 West 11th Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath 600-sq.-ft. co-op in a post-World War II building; eat-in kitchen, living room with fireplace, terrace, washer-dryer in unit; common garden; maintenance $875, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $649,000, 2 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

$370,000 319 West 18th Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath 600-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; eat-in kitchen with window, high ceilings, hardwood floors, 2 exposures; maintenance $687, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $365,000 (multiple bids), 6 weeks on market (brokers: Eychner Associates; Corcoran Group)

$649,000 290 West 11th Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath 600-sq.-ft. co-op in a post-World War II building; eat-in kitchen, living room with fireplace, terrace, washer-dryer in unit; common garden; maintenance $875, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $649,000, 2 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

$370,000 319 West 18th Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath 600-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; eat-in kitchen with window, high ceilings, hardwood floors, 2 exposures; maintenance $687, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $365,000 (multiple bids), 6 weeks on market (brokers: Eychner Associates; Corcoran Group)

$1.375 million 120 Central Park South (Berkeley) 1-bedroom, 1-bath 800-sq.-ft. penthouse co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, staffed elevator; hardwood floors, oversize windows, 3 exposures, Central Park view; 500-sq.-ft. terrace; maintenance $1,835, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $1.375 million, 10 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

$2.57 million 226 West 71st Street 6-bedroom, 8-bath, prewar town house; dining room, windowed eat-in kitchen, library, home office, maid's room, fireplace, high ceilings, hardwood floors, whirlpool bath; terrace, 20-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $24,000; listed at $2.75 million, 64 weeks on market (broker: Bellmarc Realty)

$685,000 800 Riverside Drive (157th Street) 3-bedroom, 2-bath 1,650-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge; dining room, hardwood floors, original moldings and detail, 2 exposures, common garden in complex; maintenance $814, 25% tax-deductible; listed at $710,000, 8 weeks on market (broker: Klara Madlin Real Estate)

$630,000 237 West 259th Street 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath 74-year-old brick house; dining room, hardwood floors; front and rear porches, 2-car garage, 49-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,752; listed at $650,000, 21 weeks on market (broker: Trebach Realty)

$915,000 490 East 17th Street 5-bedroom, 3-bath 3-story prewar house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, high ceilings, parquet floors, stained glass windows, original detail; 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,492; listed at $929,000, 6 weeks on market (broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)

$1.125 million 27 Prospect Park West 2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, staffed elevator; renovated kitchen, maid's room, hardwood floors, Prospect Park and Manhattan skyline views; maintenance $1,595, 44% tax-deductible; listed at $1.125 million, 4 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group Brooklyn)

$569,000 55 Eastern Parkway 3-bedroom, 2-bath 1,350-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; part-time doormen; renovated kitchen and baths, high ceilings, hardwood floors, 3 exposures; maintenance $802, 48% tax-deductible; listed at $569,000, 1 week on market (broker: Susan N. Breen)

$659,200 68-55 Fleet Street 2-family, 64-year-old semiattached brick house; 1 bedroom, 1 bath, eat-in kitchen in each unit; finished basement, 1-car garage, 25-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,800; listed at $690,000, 3 weeks on market (broker: Advantage Forest Hills Realty)

$1.895 million 422 Riversville Road 3-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath 56-year-old colonial-style house; windowed kitchen, library, 4 fireplaces; 2-car garage, 2.79-acre lot; taxes $16,926; listed at $1.895 million, 1 week on market (brokers: David Ogilvy & Associates; William Raveis)
